title: Error On Korean Language Change

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Before the updates, I was able to change the language into Korean, but now i always get an error on the update. Any solutions?

replies.body: Each region has their own set of languages that they use. At the moment, NA only supports English and that can't be changed without switching regions. You can check out our [**language guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) to see what languages are available on which regions.
Seems like it's not possible anymore unfortunately. It's been happening a few patches back.
